document.masterDocTitle: The checklist of longhorn beetles (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae) from India

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The checklist of longhorn beetles (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae) from India

subSubSection.paragraph: Cerambyx rubiginosus Voet, 1778 : 14, pl. XIII, fig. 53 (n. n.); Voet, 1 806: 14, pl. XIII, fig. 53 (n. n.).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Batocera chlorinda
Thomson, 1857d : 171
;
Thomson, 1858b : 456
; Thomson, 1859: 80;
Thomson, 1878a : 9
( Type ).

Batocera polli
Gahan, 1890a : 55
, pl. VII, fig. 2.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality:
China : Xizang ( Tibet ) (HT), Unknown.

Batocera (Batocera) rufomaculata Duffy, 1960: 187
, fig. 109 (postnotal fold) (P. n.).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Batocera rufomaculata rufomaculata
Ambrus & Grosser, 2012 : 456
(Distr.)
; Kumawat et al., 2015: 7887 (c. l).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution: India ( India Orientalis; Assam ; Andaman I.; TN: Tiruchinapalli; AR; WB), Tibet , China , Malaysia ,
Sri Lanka
, Pakistan , Myanmar . Introduced in Mauritius , Rodriguez, Palaearctic Region : South Turkey : Adana , Syria , Israel , Palestine ; Ethiopian Region : Libia , East Africa, Mascareignes,
La Réunion
, Comores & Madagascar ; West Indies: Puerto Rico , Barbados & Virgin Is.: St. Croix, St. Thomas, Tortola .
